articles.content:
John Lydon has distanced himself from the Sex Pistols after accusing them of aiming to “cash in” on the Queen’s death.
In a thread shared on Twitter, Lydon’s band Public Image Ltd explained the form… [+2245 chars]

articles.title: Prince William inherits £1,000,000,000 estate that draws in £23,000,000 a year - Metro.co.uk
articles.description: The new heir takes over the Duchy of Lancaster from his father, King Charles.
articles.content:
King Charles Duchy is being passed on to Prince William, the new heir to the throne (Picture: AFP)

articles.title: Heartbreaking reason Great British Bake Off's Matt Lucas gives for dramatic weight loss - Wales Online
articles.description: Fans had been left concerned when the star appeared on the show having clearly shed a lot of weight
articles.content: Great British Bake Off star Matt Lucas left fans stunned by his dramatic weight loss when the show returned to TV screens this week. Many feared for his heath - but the show's host has now given the … [+1988 chars]
